snippet: The Kansas City Royals right-hander Luke Hochevar is likely to miss at least the first two months of the season because of a ligament sprain in his right elbow.
abstract: Kansas City Royals right-hander Luke Hochevar will likely miss at least the first two months of the season because of a ligament sprain in his right elbow.
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Royals right-hander Luke Hochevar is likely to miss at least the first two months of the season because of a ligament sprain in his right elbow.
